chapters.title: Chapter 9: To Die Well
chapters.info: Bakh, p. 212—Malkieri soldier. He kept a loaded crossbow on his horse at all times. He died when his sword caught in a Trolloc's armor: two more Trollocs pulled him down as he reached for his spare sword, so he pulled out the crossbow, hit a Trolloc in the eye with it at point-blank range, then put his boot knife in the other's neck just as it gutted him.
